title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout. Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the Launch item is moved to the first row. However, it should stay on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. The Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem).
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (the last coolItem on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (the last coolItem on the first row), placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.
   - This will delete the first item on the second row.
   - You should notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs, but it should remain. Also, the Launch item should still be on the second row.

1. Run the attached test case.
2. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row.
3. Drag the Launch coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Script item.
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem.
5. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Search coolitem.
6. Press the Delete button.
   - This will delete the first item on the second row.
   - You should notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs, but it should remain.
